title: Hour 3 - Sam Smith (05-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Sam Smith (05-22-20)
description:
Writer and author of "The Jordan Rules"Sam Smith details the difficult history between Horace Grant and Michael Jordan and says that M.J.'s most infamous game is nothing but a lie!
